content.raw:
Although it’s reporting a failed ABI test, the description of the failure indicates that it’s okay.

> Call of any virtual method at **higher** position in this class or its subclasses may result in crash or incorrect behavior of applications.

I assume that `higher` means a higher index, but the new `BaseComponent::TypeName` symbol is at the highest index in the table, so nothing should be affected.
content.html:
Although it’s reporting a failed ABI test, the description of the failure indicates that it’s okay.

Call of any virtual method at higher position in this class or its subclasses may result in crash or incorrect behavior of applications.

I assume that higher means a higher index, but the new BaseComponent::TypeName symbol is at the highest index in the table, so nothing should be affected.
